## cilium-operator-generic metrics list

List all metrics for the operator

```
cilium-operator-generic metrics list [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                    help for list
  -p, --match-pattern string    Show only metrics whose names match matchpattern
  -o, --output string           json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
  -s, --server-address string   Address of the operator API server (default "localhost:9234")
```

### SEE ALSO

* [cilium-operator-generic metrics](cilium-operator-generic_metrics.md)	 - Access metric status of the operator
